title: Add 'Shop is Awakening' announcement banner to Shop page

requirements.summary: Render the provided static 'Shop is Awakening' announcement near the top of the public Shop page, styled with existing layout and shadcn/ui components.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the Shop page shows the full provided announcement message at the top of the page content area (above the existing Shop controls/products grid).
The announcement styling matches the site’s established dark-fantasy theme and uses existing UI components/classes (no new design system introduced).
The announcement text matches the user-provided wording exactly, including the ending ✨ character.
The Shop page remains functional (controls, product list, cart drawer) and layout does not break on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Add a static announcement block above the existing shop controls within the main content section. Use existing layout/components already in use on this page (PageLayout, FadeInSection) and a shadcn/ui container (e.g., Card and/or Alert) to match the established theme. Ensure the announcement text is inserted exactly as provided (including punctuation, line breaks, and the ✨) and rendered with appropriate Tailwind utility classes (e.g., whitespace-preserving) so formatting remains readable on mobile/desktop. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
